text: 9.16: Jer 20.9Gu Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ bun nzuav, gu nduara won zɨ ndiv vun kuamkuav ndikndigap khaŋ wo nzuai fhu, gu tɨvar vhuuŋ guarara mbui. Zakɨra fhuvara! Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ bun nzuai ŋaar, Guma Bakɨme anan na nɨɨŋgim, gu ana muunga. Gu mba ŋaara tharga fhu. Gu Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ bun suanga fhu, mbaia, Fhe Bakɨme zumgum na suaŋv suanga tugar, gu guigira za mbatɨgirga.
